item.pole_skyroot.name: Skyroot Pole
item.handle_skyroot.name: Skyroot Handle
tooltip.spartancompat:flame.desc: Engulfs the target in flames for 5 seconds.
tooltip.spartancompat:skyroot_double_dro: All mobs defeated with this weapon will drop 2x loot.
tooltip.spartancompat:holystone_ambrosiu: Mobs have a 5%% chance to drop an ambrosium shard when hit.
tooltip.spartancompat:zanite_scaling.des: This weapon will deal significantly more damage as the weapon takes damage.
tooltip.spartancompat:gravitite_launch.d: Launches enemies high into the sky on melee hit.
